Package chiron

Class TaskList

java.lang.Object
chiron.TaskList
public class TaskList extends Object
Represents a list of tasks. Provides methods to add, remove, retrieve, and search for tasks.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TaskList()
    Constructs an empty TaskList.
    TaskList(List<Task> loaded)
    Constructs a TaskList with an initial list of tasks.

  • Method Details

    • size

      public int size()
      Returns the number of tasks in the list.
      Returns:
      The size of the list.

    • get

      public Task get(int index)
      Retrieves the task at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - The zero-based index of the task to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Task at the specified index.

    • add

      public void add(Task task)
      Adds a task to the list.
      Parameters:
      task - The task to add.

    • remove

      public Task remove(int index)
      Removes the task at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - The zero-based index of the task to remove.
      Returns:
      The removed Task.

    • setDone

      public void setDone(int index, boolean done)
      Sets the done status of the task at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - The zero-based index of the task.
      done - True to mark as done, false to mark as not done.

    • asUnmodifiableList

      public List<Task> asUnmodifiableList()
      Returns an unmodifiable view of the tasks list.
      Returns:
      An unmodifiable List of tasks.

    • find

      public List<Task> find(String keyword)
      Finds tasks whose description contains the specified keyword.
      Parameters:
      keyword - The keyword to search for.
      Returns:
      A list of matching tasks.
